name: Deck Rebuilder
description:
Play full screen to enjoy this game!

Turn Based Deckbuilding Adventure! - Repair your way to greatness Sail the ocean and learn secret repairing techniques to add to your deck to help you on your journey to becoming the number 1 repairman. Remember to manage your resources well to keep your boat in working order while under attack and remember to keep an eye on your hull so you don't meet a watery grave.

This game was made as a submission for Global Game Jam 2020
